column4: Hey, I am trying to use the partitioner of ubuntu live CD to make place for a windows installation. What format should I use in gparted? XFS, JFS or ReiserFS ?
none of those.. leave it unallocaated.. or vfat/ntfs for windows.
thereis no option vfat/ntfs, I am using 9.04 Live CD
then leave it unallocated and let windoss format it.  - windows cant install to ext/xfs/whatever.. it has to format it to ntfs or fat.
